title: spelunx - Immersive Platform Toolkit
description: Led comprehensive UX research on developer and player experience for a novel immersive platform. Conducted audio design research to establish best practices, then developed gameplay samples demonstrating design principles. Created documentation and tools to help teams build intuitive experiences on emerging technology.

details.role: UX Researcher, Audio Designer, Gameplay Programmer
details.focus: Platform research, design principles, sample experiences

title: TACIT - VR Haptics for Emotional Storytelling
description: Produced research project investigating how haptic feedback creates emotional resonance in VR experiences. Led playtesting strategy design and facilitated cross-disciplinary collaboration between researchers, designers, and engineers. Contributed to prototype development exploring the intersection of tactile sensation and narrative.

details.tools: Unity VR, Mixed Methods Research, Haptic Integration

title: Metacognition Learning Game
description: Designed transformational game teaching metacognitive strategies through gameplay. Applied game design principles to create engaging learning experiences that help players develop self-awareness about their thinking processes. Independent study project exploring educational game design.

details.focus: Transformational game design, learning through play

title: Two to Foxtrot
description: Created 2-player co-op platformer puzzle game where players see different aspects of the world, requiring communication to solve puzzles. Served as main programmer, implementing player systems, Xbox controller integration, and core puzzle mechanics. Completed with team of 4 in 2.5 weeks.

details.focus: Player systems, input integration, puzzle mechanics
